      • getApprovalStatus

        java.lang.String getApprovalStatus(PublicAPI tools,
                                   java.lang.String appName,
                                   java.lang.String appVersion,
                                   int targetProductionLevel)
        API to get security tasks status. If targetProductionLevel is 5, this API re-runs following tasks and automatically un-approves them if they don't meet the specified criteria.
        TASK_NAME Un-Approved when
        PRODUCTION_LEVEL production level is not set to 5
        CHECKEDOUT_RULES Specified application contains checkedout rules
        If targetProductionLevel is 5, this API also analyzes UNLOCKED_RULESETS task and returns a warning status for this task if mentioned application has unlocked rulesets or application record is not secured.
        Parameters:
        appName -
        appVersion -
        targetProductionLevel -
        tools -
